00020 {
00021   void TriggerWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00022   {
00023     
00024     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("TriggerConfigurationName",
00025                                                    "Name of the event parameter name which contains the trigger configuration bits.",
00026                                                    _parNameTriggerConf,
00027                                                    std::string(PAR_TRIGGER_CONF));
00028 
00029     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("TriggerEventName",
00030                                                    "Name of the event parameter name which contains the current trigger main word .",
00031                                                    _parNameTriggerEvent,
00032                                                    std::string(PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT));
00033 
00034     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("MultiBitName",
00035                                                    "Name of the event parameter name which contains the current veto bit .",
00036                                                    _parNameMultiBit,
00037                                                    std::string(PAR_MULTI_BIT));
00038 
00039     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("MultiAmplitudeName",
00040                                                    "Name of the event parameter name which contains the current veto adc counts .",
00041                                                    _parNameMultiAmplitude,
00042                                                    std::string(PAR_MULTI_AMPL));
00043 
00044   }

00046   void TriggerWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00047   {
00048 
00049     hostTree->Branch("multiADC",    &_trigBits.multiADC,  "multiADC/F");
00050     hostTree->Branch("multiBit",    &_trigBits.multi,    "multiBit/I");
00051     hostTree->Branch("beamBit",     &_trigBits.beam,     "beamBit/I");
00052     hostTree->Branch("spillBit",    &_trigBits.spill,    "spillBit/I");
00053     hostTree->Branch("pedestalBit", &_trigBits.pedestal, "pedestalBit/I");
00054     hostTree->Branch("purePedBit",  &_trigBits.purePed,  "purePedBit/I");
00055     hostTree->Branch("cosmicsBit",  &_trigBits.cosmics,  "cosmicsBit/I");
00056     hostTree->Branch("calibBit",    &_trigBits.calib,    "calibBit/I");
00057     hostTree->Branch("cherenkowBit",&_trigBits.cherenkow,"cherenkowBit/I");
00058     hostTree->Branch("cherenkow2Bit",&_trigBits.cherenkow2,"cherenkow2Bit/I");
00059     hostTree->Branch("a3x3Bit",     &_trigBits.a3x3,     "a3x3Bit/I");
00060     hostTree->Branch("b3x3Bit",     &_trigBits.b3x3,     "b3x3Bit/I");
00061     hostTree->Branch("a10x10Bit",   &_trigBits.a10x10,   "a10x10Bit/I");
00062     hostTree->Branch("a20x20Bit",   &_trigBits.a20x20,   "a20x20Bit/I");
00063     hostTree->Branch("b10x10Bit",   &_trigBits.b10x10,   "b10x10Bit/I");
00064     hostTree->Branch("a100x100Bit", &_trigBits.a100x100, "a100x100Bit/I");
00065     hostTree->Branch("b100x100Bit", &_trigBits.b100x100, "b100x100Bit/I");
00066     hostTree->Branch("vetoBit",     &_trigBits.veto,     "vetoBit/I");
00067     hostTree->Branch("tcmtEventBit",&_trigBits.tcmtEventBit,"tcmtEventBit/I");
00068 
00069   }

00072   void TriggerWriteEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00073   {
00075     //    TriggerBits triggerConf = evt->getParameters().getIntVal(_parNameTriggerConf);
00076     TriggerBits triggerEvent = evt->getParameters().getIntVal(_parNameTriggerEvent);        
00077 
00078     _trigBits.multiADC  = evt->getParameters().getFloatVal(_parNameMultiAmplitude);
00079     _trigBits.multi     = evt->getParameters().getIntVal(_parNameMultiBit);
00080     _trigBits.beam      = triggerEvent.isBeamTrigger();
00081     _trigBits.spill     = triggerEvent.isSpill();
00082     _trigBits.pedestal  = triggerEvent.isPedestalTrigger();
00083     _trigBits.purePed   = triggerEvent.isPurePedestalTrigger();
00084     _trigBits.calib     = triggerEvent.isCalibTrigger();
00085     _trigBits.cosmics   = triggerEvent.isCosmicsTrigger();
00086     _trigBits.cherenkow = triggerEvent.isCherenkovTrigger();
00087     _trigBits.cherenkow2 = triggerEvent.isCherenkov2Trigger();
00088     _trigBits.a3x3      = triggerEvent.isSc1_3x3();
00089     _trigBits.b3x3      = triggerEvent.isSc2_3x3();
00090     _trigBits.a10x10    = triggerEvent.isSc1_10x10();
00091     _trigBits.a20x20    = triggerEvent.isSc1_20x20();
00092     _trigBits.b10x10    = triggerEvent.isSc2_10x10();
00093     _trigBits.a100x100  = triggerEvent.isSc1_100x100();
00094     _trigBits.b100x100  = triggerEvent.isSc2_100x100();
00095     _trigBits.veto      = triggerEvent.isVetoUL()+triggerEvent.isVetoUR()
00096                          +triggerEvent.isVetoDL()+triggerEvent.isVetoDR();
00097 
00098     /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099     const int tcmtTriggerValue = evt->getParameters().getIntVal("TcmtEventBit");
00100     TcmtEventBits tcmtBit(tcmtTriggerValue);
00101     _trigBits.tcmtEventBit = tcmtBit.isMuon();
00102     /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00103     
00104     
00105   }
00106 
00107 }//namespace marlin
